reference.title: Query warning messages
reference.shortdesc: When you are generating a data view or analyzing entities, you must use filters to specify your search criteria. When a filter is activated, it is indicated with the icon. However, if a filter is invalid, an error or warning message is displayed.

propdesc.p: Error. There is a problem with the information in the filter. You cannot generate the report or search when there is an error.
Warning. There is a potential problem with the information in the filter. The report or search might take longer than usual to generate.

section.p: Hover your mouse over the health status icon to see the warning or error message in a tooltip. The following table lists some examples of messages you can receive, and what you can do to fix the issue.

row.entry: Decrease the time range for your report or search.
Your filter is empty. Select an entity or turn off the filter.
Your filter is empty. Select an option or turn off the filter.

entry.uicontrol: The dates and times are invalid

row.entry: The time range is invalid. You might have set the start date and time after the end date and time, or the end date and time before the start date and time. Reconfigure your time range for the report.
